closed_israeli_market.title: Closed Israeli-only sub-market
closed_israeli_market.description: The asset sits in a project marketed almost exclusively to Israelis, detached from local housing demand, which creates exit liquidity risk.

corporate_tax_2026.title: Cyprus corporate tax hike impact
corporate_tax_2026.description: Cyprus corporate tax increased to 15% from 2026, eroding net yields for company-based structures.

personal_tax_reporting_2026.title: Personal tax and reporting burden
personal_tax_reporting_2026.description: Using the 60-day route can trigger annual filing duties and local progressive tax exposure.

foreign_purchase_restrictions.title: Regulatory restrictions for non-EU buyers
foreign_purchase_restrictions.description: 2026 proposals include one-unit limits, area caps and restrictions near sensitive infrastructure.

remote_management_costs.title: Remote management yield erosion
remote_management_costs.description: Cross-border management fees, HOA and maintenance reserve materially reduce gross-to-net yield.

ktimatologio_title_gaps.title: Greek land registry and title gaps
ktimatologio_title_gaps.description: Many properties still suffer from imperfect registration, hidden liens, inheritance issues and unregularized building deviations.

bureaucracy_complexity.title: Bureaucratic complexity
bureaucracy_complexity.description: Greek transactions typically require independent local lawyer, notary and engineer workflows.

high_closing_costs.title: High closing costs
high_closing_costs.description: Acquisition and closing costs can reach 8% to 12% of deal value in Greece.

municipal_debts_tap.title: Hidden municipal debt (TAP)
municipal_debts_tap.description: Municipal debt can transfer to new owners and create unexpected liabilities.

demographic_headwinds.title: Demographic headwinds
demographic_headwinds.description: Negative natural growth and youth emigration can impact long-term demand in some segments.

remote_management_costs.title: Remote management and maintenance
remote_management_costs.description: Remote operation from Israel can materially compress net rental returns.

golden_visa_thresholds.title: Golden Visa threshold exit risk
golden_visa_thresholds.description: Higher minimum investment thresholds can reduce foreign demand in hot zones and hurt exit liquidity.

criminal_ownership.title: Criminal ownership exposure in North Cyprus
criminal_ownership.description: Acquiring disputed property can lead to criminal and cross-border enforcement risk.

black_market_liquidity.title: Severe black-market liquidity risk
black_market_liquidity.description: Limited institutional financing and insurance can make exits exceptionally difficult.

form150_cfc_enforcement.title: Form 150 / CFC enforcement exposure
form150_cfc_enforcement.description: CRS data matching and stricter Form 150 enforcement increase reporting and penalty risk.

flat15_double_tax.title: Flat 15% route: double-tax risk
flat15_double_tax.description: The gross 15% route without foreign tax credit can materially increase total effective tax burden.

marginal_route_complexity.title: Marginal route compliance complexity
marginal_route_complexity.description: Marginal taxation is operationally heavier but allows deductions and foreign tax credit alignment.
